name: Shackled: Arena
description:
Shackled: Arena isn't as much of as game as much as it is an asset showcase with an objective, beginning and end. 

Trapped in the ancient remains of an ever-changing arena; you're tasked with forging a weapon and fighting whatever challenge awaits you until the end. 

Hack, slash and kick your enemies to their death with a weapon crafted to your liking. 

But wait! Keep in mind that your weapon can affect your running speed, your damage output and even how fast you can swing it! 
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Creator's note: Shackled, being a showcase of an asset; also acts as an experiment and isn't reflective of current or future titles.
